article.citation: Authors unspecified: Determination of sulfanitran in animal feeds and pre-mixes. Analyst. 1977 Nov;102(1220):869-72.
Zheng H, Wang P, Li J: [Determination of 12 sulfonamides in cosmetics by ultra performance liquid chromatography]. Se Pu. 2007 Mar;25(2):238-40.

Zelcer N, Huisman MT, Reid G, Wielinga P, Breedveld P, Kuil A, Knipscheer P, Schellens JH, Schinkel AH, Borst P: Evidence for two interacting ligand binding sites in human multidrug resistance protein 2 (ATP binding cassette C2). J Biol Chem. 2003 Jun 27;278(26):23538-44. Epub 2003 Apr 17.
Parks OW: Liquid chromatographic-electrochemical detection screening procedure for six nitro-containing drugs in chicken tissues at low ppb level. J Assoc Off Anal Chem. 1989 Jul-Aug;72(4):567-9.

Ursic D, Berginc K, Zakelj S, Kristl A: Influence of luminal monosaccharides on secretion of glutathione conjugates from rat small intestine in vitro. Int J Pharm. 2009 Nov 3;381(2):199-204. doi: 10.1016/j.ijpharm.2009.03.011. Epub 2009 Mar 19.

Cai Z, Zhang Y, Pan H, Tie X, Ren Y: Simultaneous determination of 24 sulfonamide residues in meat by ultra-performance liquid chromatography tandem mass spectrometry. J Chromatogr A. 2008 Jul 25;1200(2):144-55. doi: 10.1016/j.chroma.2008.05.095. Epub 2008 Jun 8.

Zimmermann C, van de Wetering K, van de Steeg E, Wagenaar E, Vens C, Schinkel AH: Species-dependent transport and modulation properties of human and mouse multidrug resistance protein 2 (MRP2/Mrp2, ABCC2/Abcc2). Drug Metab Dispos. 2008 Apr;36(4):631-40. doi: 10.1124/dmd.107.019620. Epub 2008 Jan 7.
Eaves KL, Colvin BM, Hanks AR, Bushway RJ: High pressure liquid chromatographic determination of sulfanitran and dinsed in medicated feeds and premixes. J Assoc Off Anal Chem. 1977 Sep;60(5):1064-6.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as sulfanilides. These are organic aromatic compounds containing a sulfanilide moiety, with the general structure RS(=O)(=O)NC1=CC=CC=C1.

drug-interaction.name: Aminobenzoic acid
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Sulfanitran can be decreased when used in combination with Aminobenzoic acid.

drug-interaction.name: Nicotine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Sulfanitran is combined with Nicotine.

drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Sulfanitran is combined with Mecamylamine.

drug-interaction.name: Cyclosporine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of renal failure can be increased when Sulfanitran is combined with Cyclosporine.

drug-interaction.name: Colestipol
drug-interaction.description: Colestipol can cause a decrease in the absorption of Sulfanitran resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy.
